title: I want to ask something
body: So , I didn't receive my rewards , i play on eune ( name - peticeldeata ) , i reached Gold V ( 6lp) and nothing.. I know i received one time chat restriction , but i don't know when , probably in summer .. Can you check or help me to understand why? I really worked for this rank..

replies.body: You'd only be disqualified from ranked rewards if you had restrictions active on the account when the season ended, so you should be fine.  We're doing another wave of passing out rewards, so hang tight.  :D  The goods are still on the way!

i had only in summer ( that chat restriction ), thanks man for you help me

When the waves of rewards will be finished?
